name: Stablecoin
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Galloping in to DeFi with the most unstablecoin on Cardano. Our goal is to highlight the best of the Cardano ecosystem in a way that helps to educate and onboard users in crypto through the power of memes. 


What makes your project unique?
Its one of the 1st projects in ADA

History of your project.


What’s next for your project?
Lots of marketing and big public presentations. 

What can your token be used for?
